trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for <xref:System.EventArgs> classes which support optionally raising exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 提供的基底類別<xref:System.EventArgs>類別支援選擇性地引發例外狀況。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The IntegrationExceptionEventArgs class enables the user to preview an exception before it is raised.
trans-unit.target: IntegrationExceptionEventArgs 類別可讓使用者預覽例外狀況之前會引發此事件。

trans-unit.source: In your event handler, set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.ThrowException%2A> property to `true` to indicate that the exception should be raised.
trans-unit.target: 在您的事件處理常式，將值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.ThrowException%2A>屬性`true`來表示，應該引發例外狀況。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.ThrowException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to raise the <xref:System.Exception> specified by `exception`; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>引發<xref:System.Exception>所指定`exception`，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to raise the <xref:System.Exception> specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.Exception*> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否引發<xref:System.Exception>所指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.Exception*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.Exception*> </xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: In your event handler, set the value of the ThrowException property to `true` to indicate that the exception should be raised.
trans-unit.target: 在事件處理常式，將 throwexception 設定屬性值`true`來表示，應該引發例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.Exception*> will be raised; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.Exception*>將會引發，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.Exception*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
